name: Cropper

values.name: crop
values.comment: Set crop size. Will be limited to image size.
values.type: Cropper.Model -> { width : Int, height : Int } -> Cropper.Model

values.name: cropData
values.comment: Get all data required (by CanvasRenderingContext2D.drawImage) to crop the image

values.name: cropOrigin
values.comment: Get starting point of crop area over imageSize

values.name: init
values.comment: Use this function to initialize the module with url to image and a crop size.
values.type: { url : String, crop : { width : Int, height : Int } } -> Cropper.Model

values.name: subscriptions
values.comment: TEA subscriptions needs to be hooked up for mouse dragging
